mapper.insert: insert into mus_reply(clothId, memberId, content, rating) values(#{clothId}, #{memberId}, #{content}, #{rating})
mapper.select: select replyId from mus_reply where memberId = #{memberId} and clothId = #{clothId}
mapper.update: update mus_reply set content = #{content}, rating = #{rating} where replyId = #{replyId}
